title: Tied in Knots
description: Revenge is a dish best served cold. Ice cold. As a bucket of ice water heaved over the naked body of the one who encouraged her.Stripped and restrained, Hannah had forgotten her safe-word and was struggling against what was being done to her in an effort to remember.When she finally does, itâ€™s all over, but revenge is planned and served in due course.
author: Xavier Edwards
